punktiert.physics
Class VParticle

java.lang.Object
  punktiert.math.Vec
      punktiert.physics.VParticle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BAttraction, VBoid
public class VParticle
extends Vec

An individual 3D particle for use by the VPhysics and VSpring classes. the functionality can be extended by applying different behaviors

this class is more or less an modification/ extension of Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPartcle class

Constructor Summary
VParticle()
          Creates particle at position zero

          Creates particle at position xy, z set to 0.0

          Creates particle at position xyz
VParticle(float x, float y, float z, float w)
          Creates particle at position xyz with weight w
VParticle(float x, float y, float z, float w, float r)
          Creates particle at position xyz with weight w and radius r
VParticle(Vec v)
          Creates particle at the position of the passed in vector
VParticle(Vec v, float w)
          Creates particle with weight w at the position of the passed in vector
VParticle(Vec v, float w, float r)
          Creates particle with weight w and radius r at the position of the passed in vector
VParticle(Vec pos, Vec vel)
          Creates particle at the position of the passed in vector
VParticle(Vec pos, Vec v, float w, float r)
          Creates particle with weight w and radius r at the position of the passed in vector
VParticle(VParticle p)
          Creates a copy of the passed in particle

Method Detail

addBehavior

public VParticle addBehavior(BehaviorInterface behavior)
Adds the given behavior to the list of behaviors applied to this particle at each step.

addConstraint

public VParticle addConstraint(BehaviorInterface constraint)
Adds the given constraint to the list of constraints applied to this particle at each step. A constraint is applied always wether the particle is locked or not
